text:
@RandPaul Sen. Rand Paul,
You’re RIGHT! Someone DOES need to  “Step Back”! 

Trump needs to STOP doing FAKE HAPPY TALK & do HIS JOB getting *PPE* to ALL Doctors, Nurses & First Responders who’re on 
THE FRONT LINE of WAR w/ COVID-19 for ALL STATES!

All Religions Centers need to be CLOSED!
